name: Shadows of the Silent Court
description: The kingdom stands on a knife's edge. As whispers of betrayal echo through the corridors of power, the Silent Court convenes in secrecy. The party is summoned to navigate the web of intrigue and restore balance.
synopsis: The party is summoned to navigate the web of intrigue and restore balance within the Silent Court.
author: Everdice DM Toolkit

locations.name: The Silent Court
locations.description: A grand yet somber hall where the kingdom's elite gather to discuss matters of state behind closed doors.

locations.name: The Secret Chamber
locations.description: A concealed room beneath the Silent Court, used for clandestine meetings and secret liaisons.

npcs.name: Elwyn Thorne
npcs.description: A shrewd and calculating lord, known for his diplomatic prowess and shadowy dealings.

npcs.name: Aria Moonshadow
npcs.description: A skilled spy and information broker, working for the highest bidder within the court.

encounters.name: The Gathering of Shadows
encounters.description: The party must navigate the intricacies of court politics, gathering allies and uncovering plots during a formal gathering.
encounters.setup: Takes place at The Silent Court
encounters.tactics: Use diplomacy, persuasion, or intimidation. Role-play the interaction.

encounters.name: Secrets Unveiled
encounters.description: The party discovers hidden truths and potential allies in the Secret Chamber, revealing who can be trusted.
encounters.setup: Takes place at The Secret Chamber
encounters.tactics: Investigate the area, search for clues, and discover secrets.

quests.name: Stabilize the Court
quests.description: Lord Elwyn tasks the party with uncovering the source of dissent within the Silent Court and ensuring the kingdom's stability.

items.name: Sigil of the Court
items.description: An emblem that grants the bearer the authority to speak on behalf of the Silent Court.
